      • getInstance

        public static MediaPlayer getInstance()
        This class is implemented following Singleton pattern. This method returns the unique instance of the class
        Returns:
        MediaPlayer instance

      • setInstance

        public static void setInstance​(MediaPlayer mediaPlayer)
        Sets the instance to be used by the other classes
        Parameters:
        mediaPlayer -

      • startPlaying

        public void startPlaying​(Song song)
        This method is used to start playing an aggrupation, method will get all the (playable songs) from the aggrupation. It will start a new thread where the music will be played. *
        Parameters:
        playing - Aggrupation(album or playlist) to be played
        random_playing - true if you want to play randomly, false otherwise
        repeat - true if you want to play multiple times the same song from one aggrupation

      • startPlaying

        public void startPlaying​(Aggrupation playing,
                         boolean random_playing,
                         boolean repeat)

      • stopPlaying

        public void stopPlaying()

      • addToQueue

        public void addToQueue​(Song song)
        This method is used to add to a priority queue any song. If an aggrupation is playing, you can add a song from outside this aggrupation to the queue. The song will be played next and after that the aggrupation will keep playing.
        Parameters:
        song - song to be played

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying()

      • getQueue

        public java.util.LinkedList<Song> getQueue()

      • playNext

        public Song playNext()
        Stops playing the current song and starts playing the next one in the queue, if no song is next in the queue music will stop playing.
        Returns:
        the song played, null otherwise

      • playBefore

        public void playBefore()
        This method will play the song being reproduced before
